mapper.update:
update user
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passcode = #{passcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=DATE},
